sourcesContent:
import {
  MainContainer,
  HeadingContainer,
  BottomContainer,
  HeadingText,
} from "../../styles/views/splitter";

export const SplitterView = () => {
  return (
    <MainContainer>
      {/* <Header /> */}

      <FirstConatiner>
        <HeadingSection>
          <SPlTextSection>SPL </SPlTextSection>
          <BottomTextSection>TTTER</BottomTextSection>
        </HeadingSection>
      </FirstConatiner>
      <SecContainer>
        <RightConatiner>
          <FirstRightConatiner>
            <TextSection>Bill</TextSection>
            <InputSection>
              <Input placeholder="$" />
            </InputSection>
          </FirstRightConatiner>
          <MidSection>
            <TextSection>Select Tip N</TextSection>
            <ButtonSection>
              <Button type="dashed">5% </Button>
              <Button type="dashed">10%</Button>
              <Button type="dashed">15%</Button>
              <Button type="dashed">25%</Button>
              <Button type="dashed">50%</Button>
              <Button type="dashed">Custom</Button>
            </ButtonSection>
          </MidSection>
          <LastSection>
            <TextSection>Number of People</TextSection>

            <LastInputSection>
              <Input
                placeholder="Enter your username"
                prefix={<UserOutlined className="site-form-item-icon" />}
                suffix={
                  <Tooltip title="Extra information">
                    <InfoCircleOutlined style={{ color: 'rgba(0,0,0,.45)' }} />
                  </Tooltip>
                }
              />
            </LastInputSection>
          </LastSection>
        </RightConatiner>
        <LeftContainer>
          <LeftDarkContainer>
            <TopTextDetails>
              <TextInRow>
                <FirstText>Tip Amount</FirstText>
                <SecTextForDetails>/Person</SecTextForDetails>
              </TextInRow>
              <BottomText>$0.0</BottomText>
            </TopTextDetails>
            <MidTextDetails>
              <TextInRow>
                <FirstText>Totle</FirstText>
                <SecTextForDetails>/Person</SecTextForDetails>
              </TextInRow>
              <BottomText>$0.0</BottomText>
            </MidTextDetails>
            <ButonContainer>
              <Button>Default Button</Button>
            </ButonContainer>
          </LeftDarkContainer>
        </LeftContainer>
      </SecContainer>
    </MainContainer>
  )}
